summary: CRITICAL BUG FIX VERIFIED: Party A data no longer leaks into Party B fields. All 8 backend tests passed. UI testing confirmed fix works end-to-end.
critical_code_review_comments: FIX VERIFIED: CreateContractPage.js now creates cleanedPlaceholderValues containing ONLY landlord fields (lines 683-696)
FIX VERIFIED: processContentWithPlaceholders() skips signer/tenant placeholders (lines 531-539)
FIX VERIFIED: Backend extracts signer info ONLY from fields with owner='signer' or 'tenant' (server.py lines 2868-2920)
UI correctly shows Party B fields as 'Заполняется клиентом' (Filled by client) - not editable by Party A
Contract preview correctly shows placeholders [Имя], [Номер телефона], [ИИН], [Почта] for Party B fields

success_rate.frontend: 100% - UI correctly separates Party A and Party B fields

seed_data_creation: Created test contract via UI (ID: 840bfbd7-2425-45d8-b8b6-b9dae2b288bc) to verify fix
context_for_next_testing_agent: BUG FIX CONFIRMED WORKING. Key verification points: 1) placeholder_values contains ONLY landlord fields (1NAME, ADDRESS), 2) signer_name/phone/email are empty after contract creation, 3) Contract content shows placeholders [Имя], [Номер телефона] for Party B fields.
